snippet: The numbers don’t really show how lavish executive pay has become.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Securities and Exchange Commission for not even proposing rules to institute requirement that companies disclose pay gap between what executives and employees are paid; contends that information is needed to fight effectively against executive pay packages that are unjustifiable and disadvantageous.
lead_paragraph: The numbers don’t really show how lavish executive pay has become.
